channel.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
channel.description:
Hey there all!
I've designed a Portal 2 singleplayer map. This map is a two-room chamber map that focuses on making use of [i]both[/i] rooms to solve the puzzle. Many areas are recycled throughout the course of the level. Repulsion gel and propulsion gel sees use in this level.
The map can be found here: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=467846609[/url]
I have had this map floating around in my head for around two years. Once upon a time I even tried to realize it but didn't get very far (I had a functioning puzzle but the asthetic didn't gel), and I lost that version a long time ago. I sat down a few days ago and decided to give it another try. I am immensely satisfied with the results. This is my first attempt at the Old Aperture theme and I think it turned out really well.
Comments and criticisms welcome!

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
Dragunov2:

Page doesn’t exist anymore

Because I was fixing the map. It’s up now.

I added a small fizzler portion that should put the exploit to rest for good. At least, nothing short of speedrunning tactics I think.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: Pauolo
item.description:
I did like danielsangeo and solved the puzzle only with the blue gel.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
…Yeah, that’s very not supposed to happen, since if you did that you skipped 5/6 of the entire puzzle. Since you mentioned it, I was able to replicate it. Going to patch that.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
In the spoilers, possible bug, unsure if intended:

I was able to complete the challenge without using the propulsion gel. I coated the area with the repulsion gel spigot with the blue stuff, bounced around, grabbed the cube, and used the elevated platform to gain the needed height to get the cube up to the button. Put the cube on the button and walk through the door to the elevator/exit.

Was I supposed to do it that way?

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
It usually takes me about three minutes to run the course. I expect it’ll take more for everyone else only because I know the map (and its solution) like the back of my hand. I would estimate a 7 minute game.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
.RK:

the asthetic didn’t gel

Har Har

Man, I wanna give it a shot, but I don’t have P2 installed. How long do you expect the chamber to take to play?

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2: [SP] Duality
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
Hey there all!

I’ve designed a Portal 2 singleplayer map. This map is a two-room chamber map that focuses on making use of both rooms to solve the puzzle. Many areas are recycled throughout the course of the level. Repulsion gel and propulsion gel sees use in this level.

The map can be found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=467846609

I have had this map floating around in my head for around two years. Once upon a time I even tried to realize it but didn’t get very far (I had a functioning puzzle but the asthetic didn’t gel), and I lost that version a long time ago. I sat down a few days ago and decided to give it another try. I am immensely satisfied with the results. This is my first attempt at the Old Aperture theme and I think it turned out really well.

Comments and criticisms welcome!
